description: WARNING: RetryDataReplication is deprecated. Causes the data replication initiation sequence to begin immediately upon next Handshake for the specified Source Server ID, regardless of when the previous initiation started. This command will work only if the Source Server is stalled or is in a DISCONNECTED or STOPPED state.

parameters.name: sourceServerID
parameters.description: The ID of the Source Server whose data replication should be retried.

nested_items.name: agentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the DRS agent installed on the source server.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Source Server.

nested_items.name: dataReplicationInfo
nested_items.description: The Data Replication Info of the Source Server.

nested_items.name: dataReplicationError
nested_items.description: Error in data replication.

nested_items.name: error
nested_items.description: Error in data replication.

nested_items.name: rawError
nested_items.description: Error in data replication.

nested_items.name: dataReplicationInitiation
nested_items.description: Information about whether the data replication has been initiated.

nested_items.name: nextAttemptDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time of the next attempt to initiate data replication.

nested_items.name: startDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time of the current attempt to initiate data replication.

nested_items.name: steps
nested_items.description: The steps of the current attempt to initiate data replication.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the step.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the step.

nested_items.name: dataReplicationState
nested_items.description: The state of the data replication.

nested_items.name: etaDateTime
nested_items.description: An estimate of when the data replication will be completed.

nested_items.name: lagDuration
nested_items.description: Data replication lag duration.

nested_items.name: replicatedDisks
nested_items.description: The disks that should be replicated.

nested_items.name: backloggedStorageBytes
nested_items.description: The size of the replication backlog in bytes.

nested_items.name: deviceName
nested_items.description: The name of the device.

nested_items.name: replicatedStorageBytes
nested_items.description: The amount of data replicated so far in bytes.

nested_items.name: rescannedStorageBytes
nested_items.description: The amount of data to be rescanned in bytes.

nested_items.name: totalStorageBytes
nested_items.description: The total amount of data to be replicated in bytes.

nested_items.name: volumeStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the volume.

nested_items.name: stagingAvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: AWS Availability zone into which data is being replicated.

nested_items.name: stagingOutpostArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the staging Outpost.

nested_items.name: lastLaunchResult
nested_items.description: The status of the last recovery launch of this Source Server.

nested_items.name: lifeCycle
nested_items.description: The lifecycle information of this Source Server.

nested_items.name: addedToServiceDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time of when the Source Server was added to the service.

nested_items.name: elapsedReplicationDuration
nested_items.description: The amount of time that the Source Server has been replicating for.

nested_items.name: firstByteDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time of the first byte that was replicated from the Source Server.

nested_items.name: lastLaunch
nested_items.description: An object containing information regarding the last launch of the Source Server.

nested_items.name: initiated
nested_items.description: An object containing information regarding the initiation of the last launch of a Source Server.

nested_items.name: apiCallDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the last Source Server launch was initiated.

nested_items.name: jobID
nested_items.description: The ID of the Job that was used to last launch the Source Server.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The Job type that was used to last launch the Source Server.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Status of Source Server's last launch.

nested_items.name: lastSeenByServiceDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time this Source Server was last seen by the service.

nested_items.name: recoveryInstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Recovery Instance associated with this Source Server.

nested_items.name: replicationDirection
nested_items.description: Replication direction of the Source Server.

nested_items.name: reversedDirectionSourceServerArn
nested_items.description: For EC2-originated Source Servers which have been failed over and then failed back, this value will mean the ARN of the Source Server on the opposite replication direction.

nested_items.name: sourceCloudProperties
nested_items.description: Source cloud properties of the Source Server.

nested_items.name: originAccountID
nested_items.description: AWS Account ID for an EC2-originated Source Server.

nested_items.name: originAvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: AWS Availability Zone for an EC2-originated Source Server.

nested_items.name: originRegion
nested_items.description: AWS Region for an EC2-originated Source Server.

nested_items.name: sourceOutpostArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the source Outpost.

nested_items.name: sourceNetworkID
nested_items.description: ID of the Source Network which is protecting this Source Server's network.

nested_items.name: sourceProperties
nested_items.description: The source properties of the Source Server.

nested_items.name: cpus
nested_items.description: An array of CPUs.

nested_items.name: cores
nested_items.description: The number of CPU cores.

nested_items.name: modelName
nested_items.description: The model name of the CPU.

nested_items.name: disks
nested_items.description: An array of disks.

nested_items.name: bytes
nested_items.description: The amount of storage on the disk in bytes.

nested_items.name: deviceName
nested_items.description: The disk or device name.

nested_items.name: identificationHints
nested_items.description: Hints used to uniquely identify a machine.

nested_items.name: awsInstanceID
nested_items.description: AWS Instance ID identification hint.

nested_items.name: fqdn
nested_items.description: Fully Qualified Domain Name identification hint.

nested_items.name: hostname
nested_items.description: Hostname identification hint.

nested_items.name: vmWareUuid
nested_items.description: vCenter VM path identification hint.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the Source Properties were last updated on.

nested_items.name: networkInterfaces
nested_items.description: An array of network interfaces.

nested_items.name: ips
nested_items.description: Network interface IPs.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: isPrimary
nested_items.description: Whether this is the primary network interface.

nested_items.name: macAddress
nested_items.description: The MAC address of the network interface.

nested_items.name: fullString
nested_items.description: The long name of the Operating System.

nested_items.name: ramBytes
nested_items.description: The amount of RAM in bytes.

nested_items.name: recommendedInstanceType
nested_items.description: The recommended EC2 instance type that will be used when recovering the Source Server.

nested_items.name: supportsNitroInstances
nested_items.description: Are EC2 nitro instance types supported when recovering the Source Server.

nested_items.name: sourceServerID
nested_items.description: The ID of the Source Server.

nested_items.name: stagingArea
nested_items.description: The staging area of the source server.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: Shows an error message that occurred when DRS tried to access the staging source server. In this case StagingArea$status will have value EXTENSION_ERROR.

nested_items.name: stagingAccountID
nested_items.description: Account ID of the account to which source server belongs. If this source server is extended - shows Account ID of staging source server.

nested_items.name: stagingSourceServerArn
nested_items.description: Arn of the staging source server if this source server is extended.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Status of Source server extension. Possible values: (a) NOT_EXTENDED - This is a source server that is replicating in the current account. (b) EXTENDED - Source server is extended from a staging source server. In this case, the value of stagingSourceServerArn is pointing to the Arn of the source server in the staging account. (c) EXTENSION_ERROR - Some issue occurred when accessing staging source server. In this case, errorMessage field will contain an error message that explains what happened.
(string) ---
(string) ---
